member.name: T:ChessEngine.AI.Doofus.DoofusChessAI
member.summary:
Doofus chess AI.
Doofus is not very bright, he will always make a tit-for-tat trade, he will never pass up an opportunity to take a piece, and he rarely makes the best possible move. Doofus does not hesitate and always moves quickly.

member.param: The team the AI is playing as.

member.name: M:ChessEngine.AI.Doofus.DoofusChessAI.OnInitialized
member.summary: Invoked when the AI is first initialized by the game. Recommended to subscribe to any relevant events here.

member.name: M:ChessEngine.AI.Doofus.DoofusChessAI.OnDeinitialized
member.summary: Invoked when the AI is deinitialized by the game. Recommended to unsubscribe to any relevant events here. (Doing so in the destructor is unreliable.)

member.name: M:ChessEngine.AI.Doofus.DoofusChessAI.OnUpdate
member.summary: Invoked after every 'Update' call. Useful for executing any logic every frame. Recommended AI best move determination logic is here, you can use 'IsBestMovePending' to check if there is a best move to limit planning time only to during best move requests.

member.name: M:ChessEngine.AI.Doofus.DoofusChessAI.OnBestMoveRequestUpdate
member.summary: Invoked after every 'OnUpdate' in any frame where 'IsBestMovePending == true' and 'IsBestMoveDelayed == false'. Logic to determine best moves should not be executed in this loop as a submission delay causes it to not be executed. It is best practice to submit ready best moves in this callback unless they were demanded, this will prevent any non-demanded submissions while there is a best move submission delay set.

member.name: M:ChessEngine.AI.Doofus.DoofusChessAI.OnBestMoveRequested(System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Invoked when a best move is requested.

member.name: M:ChessEngine.AI.Doofus.DoofusChessAI.OnBestMoveDemanded
member.summary: Invoked after the AI demands a best move be submitted immediately.

member.name: M:ChessEngine.AI.Doofus.DoofusChessAI.OnBestMoveSubmitted(ChessEngine.TileIndex,ChessEngine.TileIndex)
member.summary: Invoked after the AI submits a best move.

member.name: M:ChessEngine.AI.Doofus.DoofusChessAI.SubmitBestMove
member.summary: Determines and submits a 'best move' instantly.
